description.value:
When you reach a Sorcerer level specified in the Trickery Domain Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Trickery Domain Spells
Sorcerer LevelSpells
3@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCharmPerso]{Charm Person}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDisguiseSe]{Disguise Self}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplMirrorImag]{Mirror Image}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplPassWithou]{Pass without Trace}
5@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplBlink00000]{Blink}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDispelMagi]{Dispel Magic}
7@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDimensionD]{Dimension Door}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplPolymorph0]{Polymorph}
9@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDominatePe]{Dominate Person}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplModifyMemo]{Modify Memory}
